summary: A small addition to Whiterun Gate
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][size=3]Govle's Better City Gates
Whiterun
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=3]
[/size][/font][/center][font=Times New Roman][size=3] Some small additions to Whiterun Gates because I thought it needed a little more life, especially when I use city overhauls like Expanded Towns and Cities or Dawn of Skyrim.[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=3][b]

Install/Unistall: [/b]Use Nexus Mod Manager. [b]

Compatibility:[/b] It should work with everything, as long as it doensn't affect the same areas I changed[b]

Recomended Mods:[/b] Looks great with Expanded Towns and Cities[b]

[b]Created by: [/b][/b]Govle[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=3]

[b] Note:[/b] This is my first contribution to the community. I am very new to modding, so please be patience. Feel free to report any bugs and leave an Endorsement. Suggestions are always welcome. And yes, I intend to do the same for other cities.[/size][/font]
author: Govle
